survey.comments: This is the main survey worksheet that is core of the form.
For better view of the form in the app we can devide it into sections. Each section is represented by different worksheet. Here are presented fiew of them.
branch_label is used to identify which part of the survey to branch to. In this example it ensures proper menu of choosing sections.
clause is used in conjunction with the condition column to manage the control flow of the survey. There is a better example in name worksheet.
type is the type of the field e.g. text or integer
display.text is text that will be displayed on the screen. We can define other languages in settings tab and use it after dot as it is here - "display.text.spanish"
values_list is the name of query or choice that are defined in proper tabs

text.default: Choose a survey to fill out

survey.comments: To go to section we use command "do section" + name of section
"go to" command is used to go back to menu screen
This line is used to validate if user completed all the required fields in survey in case of skipping any section
Exit section is used to go out of section

required.comments: This worksheet shows how to create required questions with information that they are required below field.
required defines that field is required
display.hint is used to dispaly small text below the field
validation_tags are used to tag groups of fields that we want to validate
To check if value was already entered by user we need to get value of field. To do so we use 'data('name_of_field') == null' that checks it
In forms we can use css and html attribiutes. Here it is used div with "req" class that is defined in css file(example file in form folder). This file must always have name "customStyles"
We can also use calcutions defined in calculates worksheet. Here is an example that show us if user is an adult yet or not.
It is possible to display data that user already filled in. To do so we use {{data.x}} where x is the name of the field where data was collected
begin screen and end screen are used to defined the begin and end of the screen if we want to have multiple fields on one screen.

text.default: What is your main economic activity?
What is your secondary economic activity?

economic.comments: This worksheet shows how to create required questions with information that they are required below field.
required defines that field is required
display.hint is used to dispaly small text below the field
validation_tags are used to tag groups of fields that we want to validate
To check if value was already entered by user we need to get value of field. To do so we use 'data('name_of_field') == null' that checks it
In forms we can use css and html attribiutes. Here it is used div with "req" class that is defined in css file(example file in form folder). This file must always have name "customStyles"
We can also use calcutions defined in calculates worksheet. Here is an example that show us if user is an adult yet or not.
It is possible to display data that user already filled in. To do so we use {{data.x}} where x is the name of the field where data was collected
begin screen and end screen are used to defined the begin and end of the screen if we want to have multiple fields on one screen.

text.default: How much is your monthly salary?
Do you have an unpaid job?
How much do you sell weekly?
How much are your weekly expenses?
How many people live in your house?
How many people earn money in your home?
text.spanish: ¿Cuántas personas ganan plata en su casa?

text.default: How many people are under 18 years old in your house?
text.spanish: ¿Cuántas personas son menores a 18 años en su casa?

picture.comments: This worksheet is used to capture image and video in survey.

location.comments: This worksheet is used to capture geolocation.

stoplight_income.comments: This worksheet is used to show how image based multiple choice questions works.
select_one_slider is an option created specially for image based questions, which allows to answer question with an image

choices.comments: Choices worksheet is used to make some list of choices that user can make in survey
choice_list_name is the name of list that we use in survey
data_value refers each value in list
display.image is used to dispaly images in survey

text.default: Family income varies more than 30% monthly
text.spanish: Los ingresos familiares varían más del 30% de un mes para el otro.

text.default: Family income varies between 15% and 30% monthly
text.spanish: Los ingresos familiares varían más del 15% y hasta en 30% de un mes para el otro.

text.default: Family income does not vary more than 15% mothly over 6 months
text.spanish: Los ingresos familiares no varían de más de 15% de un mes al otro desde hace 6 meses.

text.default: The family doesn't have access to credit (formal or informal) or only has acces to credit from loan sharks
text.spanish: La familia no tiene acceso a ningún tipo de crédito formal ni informal o tiene acceso a crédito de usureros

text.default: Family members only have acces to informal credit cources
text.spanish: Un miembro de la familia tiene acceso a créditos informales solamente.

text.default: At least one member of the family has access to formal credit under market conditions
text.spanish: Al menos un miembro de la familia  tiene acceso a créditos productivos  formales en condiciones de mercado.

calculates.comments: Calculates worksheet is used to define calculations based on javascript expression or data filled in survey which can be used elsewhere in the workbook by referencing the individual calculation_name.

settings.comments: This is settings worksheet. Here all settings of form are defined.
survey is the name of the survey that will be displayed in application.
form_id and table_id are used to define form, basically it is name of the xlsx file
form_version is version of form, basically it is date when form was created, but if it is a subform it is needed to add "sub_" prefix to value.
default is used to set default language of form
spanish and hindi are names of lanuguages that form will be able to process
select, required, picture, subform, slider, location are names of sections that were defined before
instance_name is used to connect form and subform
